name: smartcloudops-ai-fullstack
description: Smart CloudOps AI - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:api: cd . && . venv/bin/activate && FLASK_PORT=8000 FLASK_HOST=127.0.0.1 python -m flask --app app.main run --host=127.0.0.1 --port=8000
scripts.build:full: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.install:all: cd smartcloudops-ai && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd .. && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test:smoke: curl -sf http://localhost:3000/api/health && echo " - Health check passed" && curl -s -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/auth/login -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"email":"admin@smartcloudops.ai","password":"admin123"}' && echo " - Auth test completed"
